review: Love this fire stick! It does everything amazon said it would.  Shame on me for not researching a little more to see if it would run my apps for free. It doesn't!
author: Sonny

review: Love it. I can now watch Prime on my tv. Kids love it as well. Also use it for Netflix.
author: R. Dear

review: My absolute favorite new toy. I wish I had ordered more when it was being offered at discount!
author: Brandon Q.

review: I ordered the Chromcast a month before the Fire TV Stick came out and I was impressed. I ordered a pair of Fire TV Sticks when they were made available, as a comparison, and I was blown away!Easy to set up (it takes mere minutes) and Amazon Prime Video and NETFLIX are a click of the (included) remote away!!!Video quality is excellent and it's so easy to use!I hardly watch FiOS anymore since I got the Fire Stick!!!(the Chromecast has hardly been used since the Fire Stick arrived!)
author: brien ramsey

review: This is perfect we love it...
author: Mari Hann

review: This stick is the best thing ever, easy hook up and ready to use as soon as connected. Everything on my Kindle Fire HD can be shown on my big screen tv, so well worth the price.
author: luckyred64
